name: No Escape (itch) (DannyB94)
description:
I was a Youtuber, quite a popular one at that. To make my videos I would go to abandoned buildings on my own, it’s called urban exploring. I did it because I loved it, and now it’s my hell. I’ve been trapped here for… I don’t know how long; time has become a blur. I have tried to get out but there is someone... or something else in this place.

There’s no escape.

The end of my old life and the beginning of the hell that is my new one.
